name: The Living Road
description:
In the aincent town of Hiwamoto, two Dragon Lords sought to bring harmony after years of fighting. In haste they built a road to connect them to their subjects, and thus bring two waring sides together. This road appears only to the worthy.  The road was given life, so that it only appears to the worthy, and it moves much like the dragons that gave it life.If  it has appeared to you, well,...it only means one thing... 

You (Imamura Toshiaki) are dared to try your best to stay riding on this living road, which, much like a wild horse, doesn't want you on it and will try it's best to get you off it!

This will be an ultimate test of speed, handling and patience. Can you handle it?
